page.title: 08Tockholes Rd. and Sunnyhurst
page.content: At the side of Tockholes Rd. there is a row of allotments where there are many greenhouses. Allthe houses on the road are detached or semi-detached and all different because they have been built by the owner or friend of the owner. It is a viewpoint for the town and when up here their are a lot of rates to pay.The S.W corner of this square is moor and woodland. Moving to the N.E corner is the main road and just above is the place where all good shoppers come. It has many kinds selling everything from toys to antiques. It has several pubs,a branch of Do-It-All and a tyre centre. It also has three Indian restaurants, several take-aways and an ever growing branch of ICI. The river Darwen runs down the back of the main road.
